item.description:
I have not been there before and this weekend is expected to be super (sunny and upper 50s). With clear skies, the 360° summit affords views of the Green Mtns., White Mtns., the Atlantic Ocean, and Boston's skyline. There is a long route (Lincoln Trail, 5 mi.) and two shorter routes (Barlow Trail, 1.7 mi.; Winslow Trail, 1.1 mi.), as you can see on the attached map. I figure the Barlow Trail is best... unless folks want to be more adventurous. Figure 3 hours round trip if we do Barlow.

http://www.nhstateparks.org/uploads/pdf/KearsargeHikingMap_Web.pdf

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Mt. Kearsarge on Saturday
